abstract: Lawrence H. Summers has gained a reputation as a brilliant, yet supercilious, figure throughout his high-profile career, William D. Cohan writes in a profile of the head of the White House National Economic Council for Vanity Fair.
snippet: Lawrence H. Summers has gained a reputation as a brilliant, yet supercilious, figure throughout his high-profile career, William D. Cohan writes in a profile of the head of the White House National Economic Council for Vanity Fair.
lead_paragraph: There seems to be little doubt that Lawrence H. Summers is a polarizing figure.

headline.main: Will the Real Larry Summers Please Stand Up?
